definitions.definition: A form of microphone that detects and records seismic vibrations .
A percussion instrument consisting of a drum filled with pellets , played by swirling it around to produce a sound like shifting earth.

main_definition: ( geology ) A form of microphone that detects and records seismic vibrations .
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A percussion instrument consisting of a drum filled with pellets , played by swirling it around to produce a sound like shifting earth.
